description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Update Stack elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43530), you should apply the updates provided in KB5046633 and KB5046613 for your specific Windows version.

1. Determine your current Windows version and build number.
2. Access the following links to download the appropriate update package:
   - [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633) (for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2)
   - [KB5046613](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613) (for Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2)
3. Install the downloaded updates.
4. Restart your computer to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the improper access control as defined in CWE-284, preventing potential elevation of privilege.
- Ensure you back up important data before proceeding with updates to avoid any data loss during the installation process.
